JOB DESCRIPTION:
Software Development Engineer (SDE) for .NET web platform will work with SARANGSoft's Web Development team to develop websites, web applications, and RESTful web services using 

 .NET Framework, C#, MVC4+, SQL Server, LINQ, Entity Framework, IIS, WCF etc.

and  HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, AJAX / jQuery, Cloud technologies (AWS Azure)

ACADEMIC / EDUCATION

The candidate must have one of the following educational qualifications / backgrounds.

 B.E. / B.Tech in CS / ECE / EE

 M.Tech in CS / ECE / EE

 MCA

 M.Sc. in CS / Math / Stat / Physics

 B.Sc along with adequate IT education / training and experience

EXPERIENCE

This is not an entry level position. The candidate will be placed at a suitable level based on academic background, experience, and actual skills. However, at least two (2) years hands-on experience with software design and development for the .NET technologies and web platform is a must. That means good knowledge of Windows Server, .NET Framework, C#, MVC4+, SQL Server, LINQ, Entity Framework, IIS, WCF, relevant tools (e.g., Visual Studio) etc. The candidate must be able to create test plans (unit test, component test, integration test) as well as build and run test suites to verify software quality as part of the development process.

REQUIRED

The candidate needs to

 Have strong analytical skills

 Have thorough knowledge of Windows tools and technologies

 Have ability to clearly think about a scenario and offer ideas / solutions

 Have good written and verbal communication

 Have attention to details and be thorough in execution

 Be independent and self-motivated to take up and resolve problems

 Be a team player who respects others, gives a helping hand, asks for help when needed
